resources.string: %1$s roars like a spit: There is no field!
%1$s stands there and shakes his head: There is no field in front of me!
%1$s stands there and shakes his head: There is no field behind me!
%1$s stands there and shakes his head: There is no grass at all!
%1$s stands there and shakes his head: there is no bucket!
%1$s stands there and shakes his head: I have to eat first!
%1$s stands there and shakes his head: There is nothing to smoke here!
